channel.title: Saradomin Sword help

item.title: Saradomin Sword help
item.dc:creator: @Gold_Light Gold Light
item.description:
@Gold_Light wrote:

There is a Model Viewer you can get and check to make sure the Saradomin Sword is in the Models it shouldn’t be invisible go into items.cfg and class8.java and make sure the Saradomin sword isn’t counter acting with any other id’s and click CTRL + F and type the Saradomin Sword’s Id and make sure its not going with any other ID that’s all I can say.

Read full topic

item.title: Saradomin Sword help
item.dc:creator: @Cronic123 Cronic123
item.description:
@Cronic123 wrote:

I need help with saradomin sword i hve the code for it but it doesnt turn up right its fuly functional just wrong number i just want to know where i change model number or is the model number and item id number the same?

here is my code

if(i == 8100) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 22457; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 924; class8.anInt174 = 4200; class8.anInt181 = 2151; class8.anInt190 = 636; class8.anInt198 = 1521; class8.anInt204 = 144; class8.anInt169 = 3; class8.anInt194 = 3; class8.anInt165 = 4204; class8.anInt200 = 4204; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Saradomin sword"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A powerful sword brought to you by the gods".getBytes(); }
